responses:
Ummm, according to me you can follow one of these 6 things to cope with boredom. Getting bored is normal and everyone feels this atleast once in their lifetime.
		   1.Try somethings new.
		   2. If you are in the middle of a task, remind yourself why you're doing this.
		   3. Listen to some good music/song.
		   4. Watch some movies.
		   5. Follow your hobbies.
		   6. Connect with people.
